summary:
Smelt certain weapons (more to come) into ingots.
 - All Basic iron done
I suggest you use this mod http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=874
descriptionHtml:
I suggest you now use [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=874]this mod[/url] by the awesome valdosa!

Smelt certain weapons (more to come) into ingots!

Currently Done:
 - All Iron (weapons and armour)
 - You now gain less ingots than the weapon normally takes to make. (more realistic and prevents cheating

Thanks to this tutorial: [url]http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1286593-tutorial-making-new-smithing-recipes-pre-ck/[/url]

V0.1
Intial release
V0.2
Added more iron weapons and armour (now done)
Now gain less ingots than the weapon normally takes to make.
author: rookwood101
